sentences.en: A commotion arose in the aisle behind them among police guards and latecomers.
sentences.cn: 他们后面的走廊里,在警卫和来迟的观众间掀起一阵骚动.

sentences.en: Everyone looked to see what was causing the commotion .
sentences.cn: 大家都在看是什么引起了喧闹。

sentences.en: His reverie had thrown him into severe commotion.
sentences.cn: 他的白日梦把他带入了严重的混乱.

sentences.en: I heard a commotion and went to see what was happening.
sentences.cn: 我听到一阵喧闹便去看看发生了什么事情。

sentences.en: I heard a commotion and went to see what was happening.
sentences.cn: 我听到一阵喧闹声,就去看看发生了什么事.

sentences.en: Sounds of voices and commotion could be heard downstairs now.
sentences.cn: 现在能听见楼下人声鼎沸。

sentences.en: Suddenly the whole street was in commotion.
sentences.cn: 突然间,整条街道变得一片混乱.

sentences.en: Suddenly, there was a great commotion next door.
sentences.cn: 突然隔壁发生了巨大的骚乱.

sentences.en: The next moment there was a tremendous commotion.
sentences.cn: 接着就发生了一场大混乱.

sentences.en: The oxygen and carbon will snap together with a tremendous vengeance and commotion.
sentences.cn: 氧和碳的结合都是非常彻底而剧烈的.

sentences.en: The reign of Pluto, which spreads beneath our burning fields , seems rent with unseen commotion.
sentences.cn: 普路同在我们炽热的大地下面的权势似乎被看不见的混乱粉碎了.

sentences.en: There was a regular commotion in the room.

sentences.cn: 他们听见楼下一阵骚动。

sentences.en: They made a commotion by yelling at each other in the theatre.
sentences.cn: 他们在剧院里相互争吵,引起了一阵骚乱.

sentences.en: Yet for all that, the commotion she kicked up was becoming positively unbearable.
sentences.cn: 不过, 无论她有多么大的功劳,她的闹腾劲儿可也真没法受.

sentences.en: You're making a great commotion about nothing.

trans.tran_en: A commotion is a lot of noise, confusion, and excitement
